alert.note: Alert for Boone; Kenton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 7:13PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, SOUTHERN DEARBORN, NORTH CENTRAL SWITZERLAND, NORTHERN KENTON AND BOONE COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM EST... At 712 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located near Dillsboro, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Independence, Erlanger, Edgewood, Elsmere, Fort Mitchell, Villa Hills, Crescent Springs, Aurora, Crestview Hills, Lakeside Park, Rising Sun, Oakbrook, Burlington, Union, Dillsboro, French, Hartford, Aberdeen and Idlewild. This includes I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 177 and 186. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
